snippet: Analysts fear a slowdown at the electronics exporter, which reports earnings next week, as the South Korean currency makes its products less competitive.
lead_paragraph: Analysts fear a slowdown at the electronics exporter, which reports earnings next week, as the South Korean currency makes its products less competitive.

headline.main: Samsung Stock Falls 5% as Won Gains Strength
headline.print_headline: Samsung Stock Falls 5% as Won Gains Strength
